word:
MR No. 1075 - Needy Fields To Be Cultivated; Meetinghouses To Be Built

     (Written November 23, 1908, from Sanitarium, California, to J. D. Rice, Oakland California.) 


     During the night I have had a special experience. A representation was given me in regard to the Berkeley church, and I was given a message for the church. They have need of much instruction. If they will heed the warning, it will be to them a savor of life unto life. The Spirit of God will be with all who will open their hearts to hear.
